title: Father Of Police Officer Reflects On Tensions Between Cops, Community
teaser: At a time when police departments across the country are facing intense criticism, commentator Murray Horwitz says this is a tough time to be a cop. His son is a police officer, and Horwitz says that while there are some bad cops, most do good work.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
